timeline.bodyText: Presto uses method handles for stored procedures too.

timeline.bodyText: Does this need to be a struct?

replies.bodyText: Procedures are supposed to return Spark rows that will be reported as output. So it is the type of those rows.
replies.author: aokolnychyi

timeline.message: Get rid of MethodHandle & minor fixes

timeline.bodyText: I think for all of the connector interfaces, we should add clear Javadoc.

replies.bodyText: I'll add Javadoc in a follow-up PR. I need to document other places like IcebergSparkSessionExtensions. I want to have at least one procedure to be merged using these APIs.
replies.author: aokolnychyi

timeline.bodyText: One more thing: we should also add a describe method so that we can show these correctly in plans.
